item.title: UltiSnip中的正则
item.author: Author
item.description: 1 1 2 3 snippet "(\w+).par" "Parenthesis (postfix)" r (`!p snip.rv = match.group(1)`$1)$0 endsnippet Tip \w+ 匹配一个或多个字母、数字、下划线 () 分组 $0 结束位置 $1 结果时光标位置 2 1 2 3 snippet "([^\s].*)\.return" "Return (postfix)" r return `!p snip.rv = match.group(1)`$0 endsnippet Note \s 匹配所有空白符，包括换行 [^\s] 除去所有空白符，包括换行 3 1 2 3 snippet t <tag>${VISUAL:inside text/should/is/g}</tag> endsnippet Note ${VISUAL} The syntax is: ${VISUAL:default/search/replace/option} 4 1 2 3 4 5 6 snippet "be(gin)?
